review: Amazon's hardware is beginning to frustrate me.  This is a nice device, the price is good, but like with other Amazon hardware, like the Fire tablets and Fire Phone, Amazon is being heavy handed, yet again..  I have a Roku on another TV and I thought this Stick would be similar. Being I own a Fire Tablet owner I should have known better.  This Stick it's almost all or nothing with just Amazon Prime content. Finding and using other services isn't easy, and the Menu search function on the Stick only searches Amazon Prime for movies, TV shows, etc., not Netflick's, Hulu, etc.. If Amazon is going to stay in the hardware business I wish they would learn to play nice with other services and companies.  I do understand that they want to put their products and services up front, but to the point of excluding Google Play from their tablets and not having a menu search for all the services on the Fire isn't doing them any good and to be honest comes off as slightly childish.
